programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Cowboys continue their playoff push by hosting the Vikings on Sunday Night Football. J.J. McCarthy connected with Josh Oliver for a pair of TDs as Minnesota blanked Washington 31-0 to snap a four-game skid and stay above the NFC elimination zone.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: The Cannons
programme.desc: African-American teens and their legendary hockey coach Neal Henderson overcome challenges, both on and off the ice, while playing for the Fort Dupont Cannons, one of North America's longest serving minority hockey programs.

programme.title: Beyond Their Years: The Incredible Legacies of Herb Carnegie and Buck O'Neil
programme.desc: The lives of sports and social justice icons Herb Carnegie and Buck O'Neil, who because of their race, were excluded from competing at the highest levels of their sports. Both men fought that injustice by working to make the world more inclusive.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Cowboys continue their playoff push by hosting the Vikings on Sunday Night Football. J.J. McCarthy connected with Josh Oliver for a pair of TDs as Minnesota blanked Washington 31-0 to snap a four-game skid and stay above the NFC elimination zone.

programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: Want to know up-to-the-minute reports about your favorite college football team? ESPN has it covered with this weekday studio show, a roundtable format that emphasizes discussion and opinions on the sport's biggest stories and newsmakers. The half-hour program features a rotating roster of analysts that includes coaches, former players, and media personalities.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: SportsCentre
programme.desc: TSN's flagship show providing news, highlights, analysis and interviews from the world of sports.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: From Thompson-Boling Arena in Knoxville, Tenn.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives investigate the sexual assault of the executive of a private military-contract company, they discover a larger conspiracy in Iraq.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claims that Brian Cassidy (Dean Winters) raped her while he was working under cover; when Cassidy and his lawyer utilize surprising defense methods, Detective Amaro is affected.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A top-level investment banker accuses her billionaire client of rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man under investigation for rape and murder threatens to expose the secrets of those who are working on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An old kidnapping case is reopened when a young woman is found wandering in Central Park; Carisi's conversation with a reporter puts him in hot water.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a female pundit is assaulted during a protest, Benson and Barba struggle to put their political beliefs aside to help bring the attacker to justice.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage sex worker disappears, Rollins and Velasco find a key clue in a pile of neglected missing persons reports.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler team with detectives Briscoe and Green to investigate the gunshot murder of a man believed to be a sexual aggressor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An ex-convict who sexually assaulted prostitutes appears to have been killed by a would-be victim, then another homicide suggests the woman may be a manipulative serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a criminology student is raped and murdered, detectives hunt for a suspect with an expert knowledge of forensic medicine.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler and CSU technician Millie Vizcarrondo (Paula Garcs) investigate a child's remains found at a construction site and find they belong to one of five boys reported missing 30 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives believe a young Asian's assault has something to do with a rivalry between gangs, until a second victim turns up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a girl in foster care is found dead, the detectives probe her family connections in search of a motive and a murderer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Fin are forced to team up to investigate a rape-murder case in which a police officer (guest star Michael O'Keefe) might be the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a corporate mogul is found murdered, evidence points to his son, whom the detectives suspect was seduced by his stepmother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives launch a search for a serial killer who raped and murdered two women in Central Park. Michael Gross guest stars.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler begin hunting for a serial pedophile after a 5-year-old girl's decomposed body is found in the trash.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives track down two junior-high students in connection with the rape and murder of a cancer patient who's been growing marijuana in her apartment.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 15-year-old rape victim steps off of a subway platform, and two suspects in the case admit to being sexually involved with the girl's mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are joined by Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) and Green (Jesse L. Martin) when a 6-year-old shooting victim tests positive for a sexually transmitted disease.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a baby leads the detectives to a smuggling operation that hides cocaine in baby formula.

programme.desc: A drug dealer dies in jail after being beaten and sexually assaulted.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Alexandra Cabot questions a pediatrician (Judd Hirsch) about a dead baby found in a cooler in the East River.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler hunts for a missing 14-year-old girl who may have been abducted by a foreign child pornographer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young boy witnesses the brutal sexual assault and murder of his mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.desc: The detectives believe a young Asian's assault has something to do with a rivalry between gangs, until a second victim turns up.

programme.desc: When a girl in foster care is found dead, the detectives probe her family connections in search of a motive and a murderer.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A Florida father is determined to find out what happened to his daughter after her fatal fall from a penthouse apartment in Belgium.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Kensi and Deeks search for three Marines who go missing after an ambush; Nate returns from his mysterious assignment.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Marine who had top-level security clearance, and the corpse is missing a hand.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have the gruesome task of identifying the remains of a man and woman who were stabbed in a park.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The upsetting discovery of a teenage network revolving around sex, drugs and booze raises alarms for the Stablers about their own daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Assistant DA Cabot jeopardizes the detectives' careers and her own when she exceeds legal limits to collect evidence against a serial child-abuser.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape/murder of a woman whose stepfather is a judge (Keir Dullea) known for his harsh sentencing of sex offenders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives find a baby's finger in a rape victim's purse, their investigation widens to encompass three generations of women harboring secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate to determine whether a 22-year-old with Down syndrome is pregnant as a result of rape, as her mother contends.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a transsexual is found murdered in a church, suspicion falls on a priest (Eric Stoltz) who resigned from a parochial school after rumors of abuse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for a suspect with an ax to grind when an engagement party ends in a quadruple homicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A female party-goer claims self-defense after killing her attacker.

programme.desc: A man (Fred Savage) accused of rape becomes a formidable opponent when he decides to handle his own defense.
